system.description:
Your bonded artifact has started to share some of your affinity for nature, and your ties to nature are strengthened by your artifact’s power. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.i6yg9jmich8u6jjx]{Bonded Artifact} develops a tie to nature of its own:

    • If your bonded artifact is an @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.l97xnqcpxnc12jpo]{Armor of Power}, when you spend druid or wielder hit dice during a short rest, you roll d10s instead of d8s when determining the hit points you recover as the armor salves you with a soothing sap. You must be wearing your armor for this benefit to apply.

    • If your bonded artifact is a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.00ein6jo2oc0asex]{Font of Power}, you better learn the languages of the powerful beings of the natural world. You gain proficiency with your choice of two languages from the following list: Draconic, Sylvan, or Primordial.

    • If your bonded artifact is a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.uga2gmf3559332tw]{Weapon of Power}, you gain proficiency with your choice of the Sanctified Steel, Tooth and Claw, or Viper’s Fangs combat tradition.

  • You gain an additional benefit based on your choice of @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.sygit0xifd4lbg3g]{Natural Demeanor}:

    • If you chose @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.xvy3sukz923x65c0]{A Way with Animals}, you can apply its benefits to creatures of the Monstrosity type as well. Monstrosities are often intelligent and will likely be able to offer and demand more than simple beasts; this feature only bridges a communication gap and does not confer any other benefits.

    • If you chose @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.38x8nxx6vunngklt]{First-Hand Naturalist}, you gain an expertise die to the Gather Components and Cover Tracks journey activities.

    • If you chose @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.u67vj764a5luq9au]{Leyline Awareness}, your deep connection to the flow of magic shields your mind. You have advantage on saving throws to avoid suffering levels of Strife.

    • If you chose @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.xj8kt56dwiduj5as]{Scholar of the Old Ways}, you gain an expertise die to Arcana checks and also gain an Arcana skill specialty of your choice. It does not count against your skill specialties known.
  • Half your wielder levels count as druid levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.l3qkjox9faldupcy]{Druidic Lore} feature.
  • Your bonded artifact can call to the denizens of nature for aid. Once per long rest, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.f70ggbrjfojmf2hk]{Conjure Woodland Beings} or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.y1fweqznq2s00isd]{Conjure Minor Elementals} without using a spell slot. If you have access to 4th level spells from the druid or wielder class(es) these two spells are always considered known and prepared (not counting against the usual limits for either) and can be cast as a normal spell of that class’s list.
